_description: Central mapping of media types to default Output-Configs per execution mode
_note: DevServer uses this to determine which Output-Config to use for auto-media generation
_architecture: Separation of concerns: text manipulation configs suggest media type, this file chooses which model/config

image._note: eco=local ComfyUI, fast=cloud OpenRouter GPT-5 Image

audio._note: Future: stable_audio for eco, stable_audio_api for fast

video._note: eco=VRAM-tiered Wan 2.1 T2V (14B for 96/48GB, 1.3B for 32/24/16GB, disabled for 8GB)

text._note: text output means no media generation - return text only
